class.source:
def test_prompt_confirm_no(): INPUT = "foo
NO
n" console = Console(file=io.StringIO()) answer = Confirm.ask( "continue", console=console, stream=io.StringIO(INPUT), ) assert answer is False expected = "continue [y/n]: Please enter Y or N
continue [y/n]: Please enter Y or N
continue [y/n]: " output = console.file.getvalue() print(repr(output)) assert output == expected

def test_prompt_confirm_yes(): INPUT = "foo
NO
y" console = Console(file=io.StringIO()) answer = Confirm.ask( "continue", console=console, stream=io.StringIO(INPUT), ) assert answer is True expected = "continue [y/n]: Please enter Y or N
continue [y/n]: Please enter Y or N
continue [y/n]: " output = console.file.getvalue() print(repr(output)) assert output == expected
